summary: This is an email notification from an ICE system indicating that a user at the ICE-ISLIP location performed a 'Person Lookout Query' on Jeffrey Epstein's record on April 4, 2023. The email is an automated alert triggered by the query.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The individual whose record was accessed in the ICE Person Lookout Query system.

events.title: ICE Query on Jeffrey Epstein
events.description: A user at ICE-ISLIP, HSI ASAC performed a 'Person Lookout Query' on Jeffrey Epstein's record via the TECS system.

keyFacts: An ICE (Immigration and Customs Enforcement) user queried Jeffrey Epstein's record in the 'Person Lookout Query' system on April 4, 2023.
The query was performed from the ICE-ISLIP location, specifically by HSI ASAC (Homeland Security Investigations Assistant Special Agent in Charge).
The query was logged under TECSID: EFTA00144226, indicating it was tracked in the Treasury Enforcement Communications System.
The document is an automated email alert generated by the system when a user views a subject record from a query hit list.
